name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior React Native Software Engineer with 8 years of experience, I possess a strong command of **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **React Native**, and **RESTful APIs**. My proficiency extends to CI/CD practices and ensuring adherence to UI/UX best practices, enabling me to deliver high-quality, user-centric applications. In my career, I have successfully integrated **Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE)** capabilities into mobile applications, enhancing connectivity and functionality in IoT environments.
I have a comprehensive background in full-stack development, leveraging modern frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, and backend technologies like **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. My extensive experience with cloud platforms like **Azure** and **AWS** has equipped me with the skills needed to create scalable solutions that meet enterprise standards. Furthermore, my expertise in **Git** ensures effective version control and collaboration in team environments.
With a strong foundation in microservices architecture and event-driven systems, I prioritize building robust and secure applications aligned with compliance standards. I have also led the implementation of machine learning pipelines and MLOps workflows, utilizing tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**, to drive intelligent automation and predictive analytics.
